title: Tony Rettman, author of Straight Edge and NYHC
itunes:title: Tony Rettman, author of Straight Edge and NYHC
description:
Episode 284 - Books! I love them and especially when they are about things I love, like hardcore! Tony Rettman is the author of two incredible books entitled NYHC and Straight Edge. We discuss writing as a profession, the process of making a book and the importance of context. A really interesting dive into the literary world and how it collides with our independent subculture. Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy. Get your good band merch at one place, visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
